Package edu.sjsu.Team15.utility

Class CryptoUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.Team15.utility.CryptoUtil
  • public class CryptoUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all functions dealing with cryptography, such as hashing, encryption, and some encoding

                                 byte[] input)
        SHA3-256 hash function
        Parameters:
        salt - salt used for hashing
        input - data to hash
        Returns:
        always returns 32 byte hash

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt​(SecureCharBuffer secureKey,
                             java.lang.String salt,
                             byte[] input)
        Symmetric key encryption using a secret key and username as salt
        Parameters:
        secureKey - Master key to encrypt
        salt - salt used for encryption
        input - plain text data to encrypt
        Returns:
        ciphertext as variable length byte array

      • decrypt

                             java.lang.String salt,
                             byte[] input)
        Symmetric key decryption using secret key and username as salt
        Parameters:
        secureKey - symmetric key for encryption
        salt - salt used for encryption
        input - cipher text to be decrypted
        Returns:
        plaintext as byte[]

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        encoded data

      • hashCharOut

        Sha3-256 with char[] output used internally
        Parameters:
        salt - salt used for hashing
        input - data to hash
        Returns:

                                     SecureCharBuffer secureKey)
        Gets hash of of secureCharBuffer
        Parameters:
        salt - salt used for hashing
        secureKey - key to transform into hash
        Returns:
        char[] of masterkey
